text: Katarína Koščová (born 11 February 1982 in Prešov, Slovakia) is a Slovak singer who rose to popularity after winning Slovensko Hľadá SuperStar, the Slovak version of Pop Idol, shown by STV. ==Slovensko hľadá SuperStar Performances== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Episode !Theme !Song choice !Original artist !Result |- |Semi-final - Group 3 |Personal Choice |"Rome Wasn't Built in a Day" |Morcheeba |Advanced |- |Top 11 |My Idol |"You Had Me" |Joss Stone |Safe |- |Top 10 |Ballads |"Little Sister" |Jana Kirschner |Safe |- |Top 9 |1970s Disco |"We Are Family" |Sister Sledge |Safe |- |Top 8 |Hits of Year 2004 |"Powerless (Say What You Want)" |Nelly Furtado |Safe |- |Top 7 |Rock Edition |"You Oughta Know" |Alanis Morissette |Safe |- |rowspan=3|Top 6 |rowspan=3|Duets |"Say Say Say" with Zdenka Predná |Michael Jackson and George Michael |rowspan=3|Bottom 3 |- |"Oh Me Oh My" with Miro Jaroš |Jana Kirschner and Miroslav Žbirka |- |"The Shoop Shoop Song" with Martina Šindlerová |Cher |- |rowspan=2|Top 5 |rowspan=2|The Beatles vs Elvis Presley |"I Saw Her Standing There" |The Beatles |rowspan=2|Safe |- |"Jailhouse Rock" |Elvis Presley |- |rowspan=2|Top 4 |rowspan=2|Slovak Hits |"Tam kde sa neumiera" |Zuzana Smatanová |rowspan=2|Safe |- |"Pomätená" |Marika Gombitová |- |rowspan=3|Top 3 |rowspan=3|Swing |"Sing, Sing, Sing (With a Swing)" |Louis Prima |rowspan=3|Safe |- |"Summertime" |Abbie Mitchell |- |"Cheek to Cheek" |Ginger Rogers |- |rowspan=4|Finale |rowspan=2|Favorite song |"Rome Wasn't Built in a Day" |Morcheeba |rowspan=4|Winner |- |"You Oughta Know" |Alanis Morissette |- |Winner's song |"Najkrajšia SMS-ka" |Katarína Koščová |- |Finalist duet |"Zasvieť" with Martina Šindlerová |TOP 2 |} ==Discography== Albums *Slovensko hľadá Superstar Top 11 (April 2005) *Ešte sa nepoznáme (July 2005) *Naboso (October 2006) *Nebotrasenie (February 2009) *Štedrý večer (October 2012) *Oknom (September 2014) Singles *Katka *Pehatá *Koľko ešte krát *Posledná ==See also== * The 100 Greatest Slovak Albums of All Time ==External links== *Official Site (In Slovak) Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Idols (TV series) winners Category:People from Prešov Category:Slovak female singers Category:21st-century women singers
